desc: https://plumblossomink.art/ Jing works with Chinese brushes, ink and pigments on Xuan rice paper. Her paintings are inspired by nature in the Xieyi abstract style. Her calligraphy artworks draw on ancient philosophies and appear in four different Chinese scripts, including the ancient seal and clerical styles. 國畫寫意，水墨畫

layout.text: The Beauty of Brush Painting & Calligraphy

Ancient Chinese practices in the 21st century
Artwork created in Brighton by Jing Wang
